tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GridBalance (
    balance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_id INT NOT NULL,
    consumption_id INT NOT NULL,
    balance_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES Production(production_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consumption_id) REFERENCES Consumption(consumption_id)
);

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_production (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  production_source VARCHAR(255),
  production_capacity DECIMAL,
  production_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_consumption (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  consumption_device VARCHAR(255),
  consumption_amount DECIMAL,
  consumption_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE grid_balance (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  balance_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  balanced FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_providers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  provider_type VARCHAR(255),
  provider_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE production (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    production_amount FLOAT,
    production_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE consumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    consumption_amount FLOAT,
    consumption_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE grid_balancing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    balance_type VARCHAR,
    balance_amount FLOAT,
    balance_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR,
    source_type VARCHAR,
    source_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE grid_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status_type VARCHAR,
    status_level VARCHAR,
    status_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
